content.text: 0) In a saucepan over low heat, stir together the half-and-half and sugar.
content.eamr:
( inst-0 / R
	:inform ( ac-0-0 "stir"@32:36 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-0 "the half-and-half"@46:63 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-1 "sugar"@68:73 / FOOD )
		:loc ( tool-0-0 "a saucepan"@6:16 / TOOL )
		:heat ( "low heat"@22:30 / OTHER )
	)
)

content.text: 1) Whisk in egg yolks and cook until light custard forms; do not boil.
2) Remove from heat and cool, then place in refrigerator and chill overnight.
content.eamr:
( inst-2 / R
	:inform ( ac-2-0 "Remove"@3:9 / AC
		:source ( "heat"@15:19 / OTHER )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-2-1 "cool"@24:28 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
	:inform ( ac-2-2 "place"@35:40 / AC
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
		:gol ( tool-2-0 "refrigerator"@44:56 / TOOL )
	)
	:inform ( ac-2-3 "chill"@61:66 / AC
		:duration ( dur-2-0 "overnight"@67:76 / DUR )
		:ppt ( NULL / FOOD )
	)
)

content.text: 3) Into the chilled mixture, stir in vanilla, cream, dark rum, scotch, and vanilla ice cream.
content.eamr:
( inst-3 / R
	:inform ( ac-3-0 "stir in"@29:36 / AC
		:ppt ( ing-3 "vanilla"@37:44 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-4 "cream"@46:51 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-5 "dark rum"@53:61 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-6 "scotch"@63:69 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( ing-7 "vanilla ice cream"@75:92 / FOOD )
		:ppt ( "the chilled mixture"@8:27 / FOOD )
	)
)
